input: Can you batch multiple requests to get lock requests and update a note?

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequests HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCardContractLockRequests/654321 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"Note": "Updated note for lock request."}


--request-separator--
